ygData.subject: Re: Protesting NEW Rule
ygData.msgSnippet: it is called play nice rules you must share the spawn if someone asks. taking turns and such....this goes for spawns that drop items. you just have to hope
ygData.messageBody:
it is called play nice rules<br>you must share
the spawn if someone asks. taking turns and
such....this goes for spawns that drop items. you just have to
hope the thing drops on your turn. its has nothing to
do with exp so say you are camping something (you
get exp also) and a level 50 item farmer comes in and
wants to share, you have to. it sucks i know but this
keeps things in the plane area calmed down. that is
what i got from a GM.<br><br>elif serabaar<br>level 32
ranger
